text:
NAEB NEWS LETTER
FEB, 15, 1941 . Page 3
F00 ACTIONS
KFDY, South Dakota State College, was given special permission
to operate specified night hours in order to broadcast basketball
games, (2/5/41)
WHCU, Cornell University, applied for a construction permit to
install directional antenna, to change frequency to 640 K.C*, and
to change hours of operation to limited* (2/6/41)
Frank Ea Schooley
